title: Valid credentials - successful login
steps: User is redirected to the dashboard
expected: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard

title: Invalid credentials - login failure
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

title: Invalid email - login failure
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid email

title: Invalid password - login failure (1st attempt)
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

title: Invalid password - login failure (2nd attempt)
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid credentials

title: Invalid password - account lock (3rd attempt)
expected: Account is locked for 10 minutes after 3 incorrect login attempts

title: Reset password - email sent
steps: Email with reset link is received
expected: An email with a reset password link is received

title: Invalid email - reset password failure
expected: An error message is displayed for invalid email

title: Valid email - reset password link invalid
expected: An error message is displayed for an invalid or expired reset link

title: Account unlock - wait for 10 minutes
expected: The account is automatically unlocked after 10 minutes

title: Login after account unlock
steps: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard
expected: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their dashboard
